articles.description: The government sets the NSC interest rates, which are then updated every three months (i.e., quarterly).
articles.content: National Savings Certificates, also referred to as NSC, are savings bonds offered under the India Post's small saving schemes. NSC can be opened by an adult, a minor, and a trust. Further, two adults… [+2854 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: England Test side not a finished product yet: Brendon McCullum
articles.description: His reign off to an excellent start, red-ball coach Brendon McCullum said England are not a "finished product" yet, adding that winning in all conditions should become a norm for the team.
